channel.title: Projects on Nick Buonincontri
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Nick Buonincontri

item.title: Fernande Decruck
item.description: www.ferandedecruck.com is a multi-lingual Drupal site, built in support of the mission to reintroduce Decruck’s work to the public. Working on this project was especially exciting because of the challenge of localization in Drupal.

item.title: Chelsea Symphony
item.description:
Working with designer Alice Bacon, we developed a new website for The Chelsea Symphony - a cooperative, self-governing orchestra based in Manhattan. This project had both an inward and outward looking focus. Primarily, the orchestra sought to refresh their online presence, as well as create a platform for its musicians that reflects it’s cooperative structure.

http://chelseasymphony.org

item.title: Video
item.description: To help build audiences, I produce a series of short videos to promote upcoming concerts. Coming from a background in music, I research the pieces being played, interview the performers on camera, and edit down to a short video. Some recent interviews have been with Jolle Greenleaf - founder of TENET, Suzanne Farin on her album Corpo di Terra, and composer Robert Honstein on his Vivaldi project.
